The paraphrase of Erasm[us] Roterdame vpon [the] epistle of sai[n]t Paule vnto his discyple Titus lately tra[n]slated into englysshe and fyrste a goodly prologue Paraphrases in Novum Testamentum. English. Selections Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536. Cox, Leonard, fl. 1572.
[72] p.
Imprented by Ioh[a]n Byddell in London in Fletestrete next to the Flete Brydge], [[London] : [1534]
Imprint from colophon; publication date from STC. Title page has border (McKerrow and Ferguson 29) with Byddell's name in type in the sill. Signatures: [A]-D chi⁴. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
